description.plain: MisterWives is an alternative/indie pop band from New York City, featuring Mandy Lee, Etienne Bowler, William Hehir, Marc Campbell,  Jesse Blum, and Mike Murphy. They released their first studio album Our Own House in 2015, receiving positive reviews. Their second album, Connect The Dots, was released in 2017, also receiving positive reviews.

body.plain: MisterWives is an alternative/indie pop band from New York City, featuring Mandy Lee, Etienne Bowler, William Hehir, Marc Campbell,  Jesse Blum, and Mike Murphy. They released their first studio album Our Own House in 2015, receiving positive reviews. Their second album, Connect The Dots, was released in 2017, also receiving positive reviews.

songs.title: Reflections

description.plain:
The second track off of debut EP Reflections.

When asked to described the song, they said:

“A funky dance song about moving on from a past relationship.” I guess that’s what it is. That’s one of the interesting things about the song. The lyrics are about wanting to move on but the song is much more fun.

A video was released on August 25th. Watch it here!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fBrOwiHO-5w

songs.embed_content: Read “Reflections” by MisterWives on Genius

body.plain:
The second track off of debut EP Reflections.

When asked to described the song, they said:

“A funky dance song about moving on from a past relationship.” I guess that’s what it is. That’s one of the interesting things about the song. The lyrics are about wanting to move on but the song is much more fun.

A video was released on August 25th. Watch it here!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fBrOwiHO-5w

songs.lyrics:
20 ContributorsReflections Lyrics[Verse 1]
You didn't close the door
Left a crack open, I couldn't ignore
The faint possibility
Of having hope in this insanity
That we still could be
But we're stuck floating in between

[Chorus]
Put me on the shelf, discipline myself
To let the sparks die out
Shattering anything
That has reflections of you
You, you, you
[Verse 2]
Our eyes were closed with hearts open wide
Dismissed every rule to abide by
Our bodies undressed the layers of shy
Revealing the truth that was buried inside
Filled up of feelings
That now are bursting at the seams

[Chorus]
Put me on the shelf, discipline myself
To let the sparks die out
Shattering anything
That has reflections of you
You, you, you

[Bridge]
Unsure of what are my dreams, it seems
You've stolen my slumber and awakened another
Life within me that is better than any other
Reaching endless heights in never-ending nights
That can't be seen, put to bed this dream
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

[Chorus]
Put me on the shelf, discipline myself
To let the sparks die out
Shattering anything
That has reflections of you
You, you, youYou might also like62Embed

songs.title: Machine

description.plain:
“Machine” is the lead single from New York indie pop band MisterWives' sophomore album, Connect the Dots. This track was written by MisterWives' vocalist Mandy Lee and the band’s drummer and producer Etienne Bowler. It was released February 17, 2017 on digital retailers and streaming services.

Machine is a song about individuality and diversity, with the chorus emphasizing that the narrator is not part of “the machine”, a common metaphor used to describe conformity to society.  Throughout the verse and the pre-chorus, we hear descriptions of how the narrator doesn’t abide by the rules of society, doesn’t care about what other people think, and is self-empowered.

Machine is a song about individuality and diversity, with the chorus emphasizing that the narrator is not part of “the machine”, a common metaphor used to describe conformity to society.  Throughout the verse and the pre-chorus, we hear descriptions of how the narrator doesn’t abide by the rules of society, doesn’t care about what other people think, and is self-empowered.

songs.lyrics:
14 ContributorsMachine Lyrics[Intro]
Oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh

[Verse 1]
Pick apart every piece of me
And miss the point entirely
I only did this to be sane
Not for you to know my name
Go 'head and spit the music out
Please tell me more about your doubt
Don't fear, I've heard it all before
Each time makes it easier to ignore
[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, I am tired of abiding by your rules
Causing me to second-guess my every single move
You don't know who I am or what I have been through, no
So don't dare tell me what I should and shouldn't do 'cause

[Chorus]
Not here to lose
Not here for you to choose
How we should be
'Cause we're not part of your machine
We're not, we're not part
We're not part of your machine
We're not, we're not part
We're not part of your machine, no

[Verse 2]
Don't feel like having a computer sing this phrase
Not looking for a hired name to write a song for me that sounds the same
As everything fed to our brain's rammed down our throats with no complaints
Maybe I'm a dying breed, but I believe in individuality (Hey)

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, I am tired of abiding by these rules
Causing me to second-guess my every single move
You don't know who I am or what I have been through, no
So don't dare tell me what I should and shouldn't do 'cause
You might also like[Chorus]

Not here for you to choose
How we should be
'Cause we're not part of your machine
We're not, we're not part
We're not part of your machine
We're not, we're not part
We're not part of your machine, no
Hey, hey

[Bridge]
Told to look and act a way as if I'm just a ball of clay
That you can mold into whatever, I assure you that's not clever
See, now fads don't last forever, they are fleeting like the weather
And we will stand our ground while you will sink and drown
Ha ha ha ha ha!
'Cause I'm a tough girl, I run my own world
And if you don't like it, there's the door
If you haven't heard, I ain't got no interest in your business
Just here for the music and there's nothing else to this bullshit
Woah-oh-oh-oh, 'cause

[Chorus]
Not here to lose
Not here for you to choose
How we should be
'Cause we're not part of your machine
We're not, we're not part
We're not part of your machine

songs.title: Vagabond
songs.embed_content: Read “Vagabond” by MisterWives on Genius
songs.lyrics:
14 ContributorsVagabond Lyrics[Verse 1]
There you go, there you stay
Keeping low never wanna play
Wandering far, disappearing
Feet stuck in place, not moving

[Chorus]
You've been up and down, down
You've been low, low, low
Troubled sea so deep, troubled home, no sleep
You've been flying so high
Avoiding the road
Pretending to not feel alone
Pretending to not feel alone
[Verse 2]
Where to fly? Who knows?
Winds rapidly blow
From branch to branch you go
When you see the sun, dear friend, let it glow
Don't shun it all, don't let it fall
From your hands how you used to crawl
You're walking tall, no need to hide
Behind the clouds in the sky

[Chorus]
You've been up and down, down
You've been low, low, low
Troubled sea so deep, troubled home, no sleep
You've been flying so high
Avoiding the road
Pretending to not feel alone
Pretending to not feel alone

[Bridge]
Vagabond is you, ran the mile, no shoes
If the sun goes down too soon
Embrace the starry-eyed moon
Vagabond is you, swam the sea at the darkest blue
You made it, made it through
You made it, made it through, oh
You might also like[Chorus]
You've been up and down, down
You've been low, low, low
Troubled sea so deep, troubled home, no sleep
You've been flying so high
Avoiding the road
